TextView.android:text: Machine learning is a field of inquiry devoted to understanding and building methods that 'learn', that is, methods that leverage data to improve performance on some set of tasks.
Cryptography, or cryptology, is the practice and study of techniques for secure communication in the presence of adversarial behavior
Computer Networks deals with the study of how computers can be interconnected with each other and how they operate under such a setting

Computer graphics deals with generating images with the aid of computers. Today, computer graphics is a core technology in digital photography, film, video games, cell phone and computer displays, and many specialized applications.

In theoretical computer science and mathematics, the theory of computation is the branch that deals with what problems can be solved on a model of computation, using an algorithm, how efficiently they can be solved or to what degree.
Cloud computing is the on-demand availability of computer system resources, especially data storage and computing power, without direct active management by the user.
